channel.title: Rental on Renlord's Webpage
channel.description: Recent content in Rental on Renlord's Webpage

item.title: Hellish Tenancy Experience in Singapore - Pt. 1
item.description: This is a blog post (part 1) describing my hellish experience as a renter in Singapore. If you’re a prospective renter looking to rent in Singapore, I hope this post helps with your tenancy experience. I started my lease in Stars of Kovan, a short 300m walk away from Kovan MRT Station which is served by the Purple line. Its immediate vicinity is surrounded by eateries and a very busy thoroughfare - Upper Serangoon Road.
